comment: We had a lot of mini-assignments set in groups that were due at the end of class for a participation grade. We had a bigger group project toward the end of the semester. She was understanding of personal situations and was relatively lenient with late work. Her feedback was helpful, as she pointed out both strengths and weaknesses in our work.

Dr.Doan is very inclusive and has no filter. The assigned readings changed my perception on design and other aspects of the world. She cares about what her students think, and encourages them to share their opinions. She gives students the option to join class virtually which is super helpful. Reach out to her if you have any issues or need help!

I took this professor during the summer and she told me that she did not have time to help me understand an assignment and my grade. This was the first time I had reached out. She gives misleading feedback on drafts ("Great Work" when she didn't even look at it). Tough grader for final draft. Very unclear and subjective grading criteria.

I recently switched my major, so it was nice that she was one of the first teachers I had the pleasure of having for TC/ID.  She gives fast and detailed feedback so you can understand why you receive the grade that you do. You're able to reach out to her when you need help which is really nice for an online format. I'm excited to have her again!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Super sweet and down to earth/funny millennial vibes. Reading quizzes, all easy, books we read free online. Only a few larger assignments but they're easy and fun. Wants you to succeed, always able to meet with her to ask questions

One of the best professors I had at KSU. Super nice and super helpful - in and outside of the classroom. She genuinly wants her students to understand the course information and goes above and beyond to make sure her students pass. She even helped with another class I had. Amazing professor, wish I could have taken her for a third time.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Doan will be your saving grace if youre a TC/ID major. Not only is she funny, shes so sweet. She gives amazing feedback, and is a fair grader. She wont hand you an A+, but shell give you the grade you deserve, and explain why any points were taken off. I wish I could take a class of hers for all of my courses! Love love love her.

Dr. Doan is a great Professor! She makes the topic interesting and is hilarious in class. She lets students speak their mind on topics. Most of your grade is based on weekly quizzes on book chapters, very few tests, and two projects. There's one group project, but its a small one. Would take her class again and recommend it to anyone.

Amazing professor, she made her class my favorite class I've taken at the University. She's transparent and down to earth. The course material isn't hard either and she's very lenient, she genuinely cares about the class and the students she's taking.

This was one of my favorite classes. Professor Doan is amazing she puts a checklist on d2l every week showing you exactly what to due. There are no test just 3 major assignments, discussions, and small assignments. The class is easy and enjoyable since everything you do will help after college. Like the first major assignment was writing a resume.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Group projects

comment: Professor Doan is the SWEETEST teacher I've had. She's a super easy teacher and makes the class easy as hell. You just have to do the work. Yes it's basically just a bunch of papers you write , but she gives you outlines that you basically fill in with information. If you just talk to her and pay attention, you'll pass with an easy A.

I think she's great at teaching Technical Writing and is always clear on what she wants and answers every question. She has a lot of "nerd" humor she likes to use which can be awkward to some people. She does require participation in class and has daily activities. You have 5 major assignments and 2 are group related. Overall good class
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters
